item.title: Let's encrypt the Sakura server to https
item.description: Refer to the following site to set up the certificate and put the following .htaccess as root to complete the process. It's a bit jammed.

item.title: Using Color Set to manage colors in Asset Catalog
item.description: Starting with Xcode9 (iOS 11), you can now manage your colors with Assets. I made a UIColor Extension and registered a color and made a function.

item.title: I sent a code-level question to an Apple engineer.
item.description: My friends often tell me that AppleDeveloper registration fees are too high, but there are many good things in spite of the high fees. One of them is Technical Support Incident (TSI), where Apple engineers can answer questions and consult with you at the code level about bugs or problems that cannot be fixed.

item.title: Grading the UIView background
item.description: This is a sample code to make the background of UIView gradient. Reference 【Swift x iOSアプ

item.title: Implementing a custom button class
item.description: This is a sample code to create and paste a custom button class that extends UIButton. By separating the look and feel of the ViewController into separate files, you can make the ViewController look neat.
